<ul><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/">Home Page</a><span>Mock web server</span></li><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/meta">Meta Page</a><span>Meta Test</span></li><li><span>/into</span><ul><li><span>/into/the</span><ul><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/into/the/deep">Deep Page</a></li></ul></li></ul></li><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/section?var=val">Section</a><span>Section</span><ul><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/section/page">Section : Page</a><span>Page</span></li></ul></li><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/validate-fail">Validation Fail</a></li><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/text">/text</a></li><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/validate-warn">Validation Warn</a></li><li><a href="http://localhost:8080/validate-error">Validation Error</a></li></ul>
